p: The water content, the dry matter percentage of fresh samples, their biochemical metabolites (reducing and total sugars, chlorophylls a and b, total chlorophylls, Chl a/ Chl b ratio, total carotenoids, total polyphenols, total anthocyanins, reduced and total ascorbic acid, and their relative ratio), and their antioxidant activity (DPPH and FRAP assays) are reported in Table 1.
